Description:
Recipe for Success
Sale by Negotiation
Step inside and discover the features that are offered by this impeccably presented home. Comprising 3 good-sized bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk-in-robe), the home is designed for today's needs and delivers a light-filled interior enhanced by a well appointed floorplan that creates a wonderful sense of openness, ideal for entertaining. Inviting relaxation and enjoyment, the home consists of a formal lounge and dining area, an ENORMOUS open plan kitchen with abundant cupboard space and a fabulous, sun drenched family room complimented by a large bay window. Nestled at the end of a child safe court, the home features gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, a manicured rear yard and a double lock-up garage with rear roller door access. Perfect for families, downsizers or retirees, the home provides the perfect recipe for success. Inspect without delay!
For further information please contact Ben Chrimes 0438 285 337 or Paul Bennetts 0419 324 463.
Ben Chrimes : 0438 285 337

Description:
A Warm Welcome Every Time
Sale by Negotiation
Warm and inviting, this impeccably maintained residence provides flawless family flexibility and promises a balanced lifestyle of comfort and convenience. Delivering a flowing floorplan the home features a combined lounge and dining area, an immaculate, light-filled kitchen and 3 good-sized bedrooms (master with two way bathroom access). Positioned in a family-friendly court close to parkland, transport and shopping facilities, the home is superbly sited on a HUGE allotment of 976sqm (approx) and delivers a delightful outlook with views to the Dandenongs. Surrounded by manicured gardens, the home features gas heating and side access to the rear yard. PERFECT for first home buyers, gardening enthusiasts, or those who are looking to downsize without compromising on comfort or convenience, inspect without delay!!

Description:
The Art of Living
Sale by Negotiation
Surround yourself with style in this brilliantly presented 1 year old residence. Offering the ultimate indulgence in modern living, this unique and chic weatherboard property delivers defiant individuality and a well-executed floorplan. Enhanced by an impressive interior filled with a host of features, the home captures a warm and inviting atmosphere and includes a stunning modern kitchen with Bosch and Blanco stainless steel appliances, a generous family room complimented by carpet and polished floorboard borders, a built in study nook and a spacious meals area. Ideal for al fresco entertaining, this ultra modern property offers 3 LARGE bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk-in-robe), gas ducted heating, polished floors, high ceilings, internal access from the remote double lock-up garage (rear roller door access), an outdoor entertaining area and a secure rear yard. Situated close to shopping, schools, transport & Eastfield Park, an inspection of this property will impress!

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do!
Sale by Negotiation
Step inside and discover the host of features that are offered by this pristine "Display Home" perfect property. Immaculately presented, this quality family home delivers a spacious, flowing floorplan that creates a wonderful sense of openness, ideal for entertaining. Inviting relaxation and enjoyment, the home is highlighted by a light-filled interior and is enhanced by 3 large bedrooms (KING-sized master bedroom with ensuite) and 3 living areas including an elegantly appointed formal lounge and dining, a spacious family room and an adjoining meals area off the delightfully appealing kitchen. Superbly sited within close proximity to Eastfield Park, transport and a host of schooling opportunities, the home is positioned on a low maintenance allotment in a court location. Complimented by gas heating, an inviting outdoor covered entertaining area and a remote double lock-up garage with rear access and storage facilities, the home offers a fabulous lifestyle to be enjoyed by all.

Description:
Private Viewings welcome - please call anytime to arrange
Perfect inside and out.
Nestled within one of Ringwood East's most desirable, leafy avenues; this contemporary home takes full advantage of its low-maintenance 426 sq m (approx.) allotment and enjoys plenty of space and privacy just steps from Eastwood Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Ringwood Secondary College, Ringwood East Village and the train station.
Completely suited to the needs of a professional couple, downsizer or young family, the home provides three-bedroom accommodation offset by a study nook and newly updated bathroom with chic black accents, shower, bath and separate WC.
Entertaining comes naturally as extensive glazing and a flowing floorplan create a light-filled environment, while the generously-sized alfresco area becomes an extension of the indoor living zone and provides a tranquil space to indulge in outdoor dining.
The substantial kitchen with comprehensive appointments including stainless-steel appliances encourages relaxed entertaining around the breakfast bar and features an abundance of bench and storage space. Nearby, the large living room is filled with natural light and oversees the neatly-landscaped gardens.
Enjoying an attractive street frontage and set upon its own title, additional highlights include ducted heating, split-system cooling, modernised laundry, freshly-painted interiors, new carpet throughout and an oversized double garage. Close to Eastland and EastLink, this beautifully presented home is move-in ready and perfect for those seeking an easy-care, peaceful lifestyle.

Description:
Please contact agent to arrange private inspection
Please contact agent to arrange private inspection
Within minutes of central Bayswater's shops, train station and schools as well as Marie Wallace Park, this completely pristine unit fulfils everyone's brief of a great location. Vastly improved in recent years, the home is one of impeccable presentation and style with features including an open lounge/dining room with satin finished timber floors as well as a perfectly renovated kitchen with stone benches, gloss cabinetry and stainless appliances including a dishwasher, dual wall oven and another 900mm freestanding oven/stove. There are 2 bedrooms that both feature built in wardrobes as well as a neat bathroom and separate toilet. Ducted reverse cycle heating and refrigerated cooling is a huge bonus and outside there's a grass free courtyard with entertaining deck as well as a single garage with remote door.

Description:
Low Maintenance Charmer on it's Own Title!
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS NOW AVAILABLE
You can register to inspect by clicking on the "REQUEST AN INSPECTION" or "BOOK AN INSPECTION" button on this website or contact Lynn Mitchell on 0433 239 617.
Fall in love with this beautifully designed, north facing, two storey townhouse with cottage like appeal, set behind a picket fence and conveniently located in a quiet court close to schools, shops, public transport and a beautiful walking track. The ground floor features a spacious lounge that overlooks the garden through to a well-appointed kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and second living area. Down stairs also offers a separate laundry and a second toilet. Upstairs includes three spacious bedrooms all with ceiling fans (two with BIR's), a stylish central bathroom with separate shower and bath and a large linen cupboard. Other features include two split heating/cooling units upstairs plus two downstairs to keep you comfortable all year round, a low maintenance rear yard with large water tank and shed, under cover entertaining area with brand new laserlite roofing and a single carport.
Estimated Weekly Rental: $410 - $440, 3.69% annual return (approx).

Description:
Distinct, modern and brand new.
Spanning across two stunning levels, this brand new contemporary home offers exceptional comfort and convenience, designed to afford an uncompromising low-maintenance lifestyle for the first-home buyer, retiree, executive couple or family.
Constructed to a superior level of excellence by a renowned local builder, this stylish home has been designed to immerse the occupants in refined, spacious living. A perfect harmonising of quality appointments, aesthetic finishes and a series of carefully curated living spaces will ensure every need is well accommodated.
The ground floor is zoned for socialising and entertaining, showcasing spacious open-plan living overseen by a tastefully designed and well-appointed kitchen featuring on-trend appliances (including 900w oven/rangehood and dishwasher), stone benchtops, walk-in pantry, in addition to generous cupboard and bench space.
Luxury continues with the unique benefit of two comfortable master bedrooms. One is located on the lower level and features a walk-in robe and full ensuite while the other is positioned on the first floor and comprises a walk-in robe and full ensuite incorporating a bath, shower, twin vanity and toilet. Bedrooms three and four are fitted with built-in robes and share a modern bathroom. Furthermore, a retreat provides additional living space for relaxation.
A comprehensive list of inclusions afford an effortless lifestyle, with highlights summarised as; separate laundry, powder room, split system heating and cooling throughout, beautiful combination of laminate floating flooring and carpet, LED lights, clothesline, 2100 litre water tank, shed, remote-entry double garage with internal access and secure rear yard. The residence also offers a six-star energy rating.
This home is positioned just a brief walk from Kilsyth Shopping Centre, St. Richard's Primary School, Kilsyth Primary School, Kilsyth Recreation Reserve, Kilsyth Sports Centre, BMX track, as well as being in close reach of Yarra Hills Secondary College, EastLink freeway, Mooroolbark Railway Station, Kilsyth Centenary Pool, cafes and restaurants.
Complete and ready to move in! The occupants will be afforded a low-maintenance, carefree lifestyle, fully appointed with nothing left to do but enjoy the turn-key experience.
Insights: 42 other 4 bedroom house in Kilsyth have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury Retreat with Bright Positioning
IMPORTANT NOTICE: The 5km rule DOES NOT apply to private property inspections and you can attend an inspection with your intimate partner or other household member. THIS PROPERTY IS AVAILABLE TO INSPECT NOW.
Forthcoming Auction. Offers Invited.
Fresh luxurious living and a relaxed sense of inviting comfort make this sensational villa the ideal investment or starter home.
Located in a quiet pocket of Croydon North and with splashes of immaculate contemporary style, this bright and cheery unit is striking with a generous living space moving seamlessly across to the pristinely presented kitchen with stone surfaces, stainless steel gas appliances and a dishwasher.
Two well sized bedrooms both come equipped with built-in robes, the main with ensuite effect to the deluxe bathroom featuring an oversized shower and a separate bath while a private and easy to maintain courtyard includes a sundrenched elevated deck to entertain family and guests.
This fabulous "nothing more to be done" home also provides polished timber flooring, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, split system unit, LED down lights, a separate laundry and a single lock up garage with internal and rear access.
A short distance to Hochins Ridge Flora Reserve with walking trails, Griff Hunt Reserve, Coles, Maroondah Golf Park, Chirnside Park Shopping and Cinema, Manchester Primary School, Yarra Road Primary School transport, Eastland, Costco, EastLink and Eastern Freeway.
Auction 24th of October at 10am
To view the Statement of Information please use the link below:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1x-U5BTk23S50Sf5wVm51Vh5_HKVObjIC?usp=sharing

Description:
Ready for Development - Endorsed Plans & Permit in Place
IMPORTANT NOTICE: The 5km rule DOES NOT apply to private property inspections and you can attend an inspection with your intimate partner or other household member. THIS PROPERTY IS AVAILABLE TO INSPECT NOW.
On an expansive 1,264 m2 (approx.) allotment, this peaceful and prime piece of Ringwood East real estate is your chance to truly do something special. With the planning permit and endorsed plans for four town homes approved, this is an ideal prospect for an astute investor or developer looking for portfolio growth or to escape the hustle and bustle of the CBD and experience a deserved change of scenery in suburban bliss. This affordable piece of land is your ticket to all that quality life has to offer and is situated in a fabulously serene yet convenient location, only moments to East Ringwood Reserve, Eastland, Costco & Aldi, Eastern Freeway & EastLink, terrific schools and plenty of public transport options.
Online Auction Saturday 10th of October at 12pm

Description:
Lifestyle Prize in Central Croydon
Bathed in northerly sunshine and bursting with open plan space, this splendid apartment perfects lifestyle living with is premium location in central Croydon ensuring amenities are right on your doorstep. Well formed to offer separation between the living and sleeping quarters, the apartment offers the appeal of an entry foyer with cloak closet flowing freely through to the open plan living, dining and kitchen boasting Fisher & Paykel appliances, dish drawer dishwasher plus an island breakfast bench. Filling the space with natural light and offering a wonderful indoor-outdoor connection, sliding doors open onto a northerly oriented balcony thatâs superbly covered for all-weather enjoyment. A Euro laundry and family bathroom separate the two bedrooms from the living zone, with one of the bedrooms complemented by mirrored built-in-robes and private outdoor access for relaxed enjoyment. Further enhanced with split system heating/air conditioning, intercom entry, high ceilings plus a car space. Presenting a prized lifestyle only meters from Main St Croydon, Croydon Oval, Croydon Train Station, restaurants and cafes.
Insights: 54/13-15 Hewish Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013.

Description:
Enviable Entertainer with Pool and Spa
This enviable entertainer is set to suit buyers seeking a sensational family oasis. With every imaginable feature and a key location near Bayswater Station, Mountain High Shopping, Bayswater South Primary, and Bayswater Secondary, this is an impressive property to retreat to at the end of every day.
The hub of this home is the kitchen with quality shaker cabinets, freestanding SS cooker, and ample pantry space. Overlooking the dining area and lounge with warm wood fire and French doors to the garden, this property is perfect in every season. With a second living area, sizeable bedrooms, and updated baths including claw foot tub, this property possesses features of a forever family home.
The garden is equally deserving of acclaim and is designed for fabulous living. With an in-deck swimming pool, gazebo, and simply stunning covered alfresco with privately positioned spa, every element collates to create this outstanding outdoor space.
Bonus features include ducted heating and cooling, double garage, and roller door carport.
Whether your plans are to happily host gatherings or secure a sensational home with privacy, this property has it all. Inspection will impress.
ONLINE AUCTION - Saturday 10th October at 11am
